amendment.description: To reduce the amount rescinded from International Organizations and Programs and to ensure that UNICEF receives all of the funding previously appropriated to it by Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2896 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 408.

action.text: Amendment SA 2896 proposed by Senator Ossoff to Amendment SA 2853. To reduce the amount rescinded from International Organizations and Programs and to ensure that UNICEF receives all of the funding previously appropriated to it by Congress.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2896 proposed by Senator Ossoff to Amendment SA 2853.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2896 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 408.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2896 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 408.
